item.title: Five reasons to invest more time in Knowledge Sharing
item.description: I’m a strong advocate of all kinds of activities that could be summarized as knowledge sharing, due to their impact on your programming career. Some of you may agree with my point of view, but others will ask — why does it really matter? Today I’d like you to give you some example values that knowledge sharing brings to the table when it’s a part of your daily routine.
